title: For all the world's children
creator_credit: Warner-Pathe News, UNICEF, Alfred Butterfield and William K McClure
brief_description: Portrays the world-wide activities of the United Naitons International Children’s Emergency Fund (UNICEF). Shows all phases of UNICEF’s operations, from the shipment of supplies to child feeding in Europe and the Middle East. Includes sequences on malaria control and anti-tuberculosis vaccination in India. Narrated by Dwight Weist.
